Package gameMain.info

Class InfoFactory

java.lang.Object
gameMain.info.InfoFactory
public class InfoFactory
extends java.lang.Object
Factory of the Info Screen (FlyWeight Pattern). Responsible for reducing the number of objects by only creating the MVC of the game if there isn't any duplicated.
